content.rendered:
Our programme for 2016-17 is currently in the planning phase.  Dates and host venues will be confirmed in the next few weeks.  All registrations will be taken through our Regional Heat and Micro-Competition pages.

If you would like to join our mailing list and guarantee receiving our confirmed programme on the date it’s published, please email our Administrative Director, Jen.
